import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Transcription = ( {onSubmit} ) => { const [input, setInput] = useState() const [language, setLanguage] = useState("english") const [output, setOutput] = useState() const [speech, setSpeech] = useState() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if ( !output || !input || !speech ) { alert('Please complete all the form') return } onSubmit({ input,output,language,speech }) setInput('') setOutput('') setSpeech('') } return (
setInput(e.target.value)} />
setOutput(e.target.value)} />
setSpeech(e.target.value)} placeholder='Choose number beetween 5 and 60' min="5" max="60" />
) } export default Transcription
